content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (41.0,-86.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All connected to mine and store coal

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing ore
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5)
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belts and inserters connecting the system

### Smelting Array at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters handling input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Connected pipe network
- Electric poles forming network with ID 3037

### Research Lab at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
A lab researching automation technology

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure consistent fuel supply to all burner entities
- Keep coal mining and distribution system running to maintain fuel levels

### Power Network Issues
- Steam engine not connected to power network properly
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
- Make sure power poles create a complete electrical network

### Transport System Blockages
- Multiple transport belts and chests are full/blocked - implement better item flow management
- Clear blocked belts and full chests regularly to maintain production flow

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Several inserters waiting for source items or blocked by full destinations
- Ensure proper input/output connections for all inserters
- Balance production and consumption rates to prevent blockages
